sen.j: 桜井 数馬（さくらい かずま、生年不詳 - 慶応4年1月5日 (旧暦)（1868年1月29日））は新選組隊士。
sen.e: Kazuma SAKURAI (birth year unknown - January 29, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
Kazuma SAKURAI (birth year unknown - January 29, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
Kazuma SAKURAI (birth year unknown - January 29, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
He was Kyokucho-zuki (a person who newly become the member of Shinsengumi).
He was Kyokucho-zuki (a person who newly became a member of Shinsengumi).
He was Kyokucho-zuki (a person who newly became a member of Shinsengumi).

sen.cmt: Shinsengumi を付け加えました。

sen.j: 翌慶応4年（1868年）1月3日から始まった鳥羽・伏見の戦いに参加。
sen.e: He participated in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi, which started on January 3, 1868.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: He participated in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi, which started on January 27, 1868.
sen.cmt: 日にちを変更しました。
sen.e: He participated in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi, which started on January 27, 1868.

sen.j: 1月5日淀における、千両松の戦いで戦死。
sen.e: He was killed in the Battle of Senryomatsu in Yodo on January 5.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: He was killed in the Battle of Senryomatsu in Yodo on January 29.
sen.cmt: 日にちを変更しました。
sen.e: He was killed in the Battle of Senryomatsu in Yodo on January 29.
